content: The Civet Sergeant is lurking in the depths of the Crouching Tiger Temple. After defeating both the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard bosses, head back to the temple with your Keenness of Tiger and Keenness of Stone items and place them in the receptacle near the sculpture at the back of the boss arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Civet_Sergeant_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Civet Sergeant Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Civet Sergeant Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Civet Sergeant is lurking in the depths of the Crouching Tiger Temple. After defeating both the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard bosses, head back to the temple with your Keenness of Tiger and Keenness of Stone items and place them in the receptacle near the sculpture at the back of the boss arena.
